scripts.watch: concurrently --kill-others "{time}-{pid}" "npm run watch:electron" "npm run watch:html" "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:sass" "npm run watch:resources"
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:electron && npm run build:html && npm run build:ts && npm run build:sass && npm run build:resources
scripts.app:dev: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others --prefix "{time}-{pid}" "npm run app" "npm run watch:electron" "npm run watch:html" "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:sass" "npm run watch:resources"
